feed.title: DockSTARTer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.20-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Migrate old LineCharacters variable to Borders if Borders doesn't exi… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2022
  • Always return a version if a branch name is not passed to ds_version by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2023

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.20-1...v2025.07.20-2

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.21-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Only get the current branch name when needed in ds_version by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2024
  • Fix definition of navidrome data folder by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2025

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.20-2...v2025.07.21-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.21-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Migrate renovate config by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2026
  • Add Kavita by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2028

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.21-1...v2025.07.21-2

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.21-3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Warn on startup if the current branch no longer exists by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2029
  • Use Run 'ds instead of Do 'ds in notices. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2030

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.21-2...v2025.07.21-3

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.22-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use more consistent notices by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2031
  • Don't use ANSI colors in the output of ds --version by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2032
  • Add color to the version number and "Update Available" in the usage t… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2033
  • Add quotes and color to the branch names in the notice in `switch_bra… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2034
  • Add quotes around branch name in notice by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2035

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.21-3...v2025.07.22-1
